description:
Meridian is your personal guide to all the places you visit.

At the Portland International Airport, you can use Meridian to find flight times, gates, restaurants, bars, retailers, transportation and other amenities. 

At the Lan Su Chinese Garden, you can use Meridian to tour the garden, learn about plants and stay on top of events. 

At NYC, you can learn about the wide variety of permanent artwork installed throughout the historic subway and rail system.

At the Oregon Convention Center, you can browse the exhibition guide, check the event schedule, and find your way around this massive venue.

At San Diego's Balboa Park, you can access current events and get navigated to points of interest throughout the entire 1200-acre landscape.

At the Portland Timbers' JELD-WEN Field, you can use Meridian to find your seat and other stadium attractions; plus team information, transportation services, and concession menus.

At the famous Powell's Books, you can use Meridian to find any one of their million books, and get directions right to the shelf it's on.

We're working hard to add more locations every day. Visit meridianapps.com to learn more.
releaseNotes: Fixes a configuration problem with the previous update
